Uses of Class
net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.color.ColorMapper

Packages that use ColorMapper
Package
Description
net.sourceforge.plantuml
Contains classes for processing PlantUML source files.
net.sourceforge.plantuml.braille
Provides classes used to manage Braille output format.
net.sourceforge.plantuml.eggs
Provides classes used to manage PlantUML Easter Eggs.
net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.color
Provides classes used to manage Color.

net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.sprite
Provides classes used to manage Sprite.
net.sourceforge.plantuml.png
Provides classes used to manage PNG output format.
net.sourceforge.plantuml.tikz
Provides classes used to manage LaTeX (with TikZ) output format.
